name: Rie's Candy Catch
description:
Help Rie catch as much candy as she can in this arcade style game. Originally released for the CandyJam, we decided to fully develop this game and add more stuff to it afterwards. Besides the original mode with 15 levels, it now also includes an endless mode and other new features.

Controls:
  • Move left or right with ← and →.
  • Hold L Shift to dash.
  • You can also use a gamepad.
Linux version

Since there's no Unity Web Player for Linux, we've made a downloadable version for it which you can get below.

Not needed anymore since it's now in WebGL.
